title: How to enlarge block in Ghidra's Function Graph View?
content:
I can't seem to figure out how to do such a trivial task: Basically, how can I enlarge a block in Ghidra's Function Graph View so that I can see all of the instructions (instead of ...).

There does not seem to be an enlarge option when I hover my mouse over the edge of the block.

The version I am using is 9.1.2

Thanks!

answers_data.content:
You do it from the menu of this window.

Click on this icon:

Later go to Instruction/Data tab and adjust the Operands.
